attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Prime Minister Blair,

Can you stop bullying in the workplace?  There is a guy with a really big head who is always picking on me.

He also calls a guy from work Fatterson (instead of Patterson) even though he is only a couple of stone overweight.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
